description: Continuing Medical Education Symposium. The target audience is diagnostic radiologists, emergency radiologists and emergency medicine physicians.  Myer Roszler, M.D., is the symposium director. Speakers include Elliot Fishman, M.D., Susan John, M.D., Clark West, M.D., Mark Bernstein, M.D., Kevin Abrams, M.D., Juan Batlle, M.D., Constantino Pena, M.D. and Robert Quencer, M.D.  There will be lectures about stroke, musculoskeletal radiology, pediatric radiology, cardiac imaging and general body imaging.
title: 17th Annual Emergency Radiology Symposium
